column5: i see that some of the members are putting up some of their pictures from the past year so i thought i would add to the mix. here"s a few from the niagara last year and this november, the weather this year has kept my boat of the river,the last few years we fished pretty much every second weekend down there,there"s also a few from our trip up north is july..looking at all the snow coming down july sounds pretty good right now!!
nice recap,congrats on some nice fish

Well thats a very succesful 07 fishing season for sure !!!!   you had some real nice catches of walleye & all those trout from the mighty niagara river !!!...great pics too,  now all you have to do is top all that in the 08 fishing season comming up soon !!...cheers
Some really nice fish there.  The Niagara really produces some beauties.  Thanks for the recap.
Yup, lotsa nice fish there for sure.  Thanks for posting that on such a nasty day, it kinda takes off a bit of the chill !!
Bunch of nice fish for sure! Your spot up north looks like a beauty.
Looks like a Banner year Bob .Beauty pics thanks for posting and it really takes the bite out of todays weather
